basics.name: Director of Information Technology and Analytics
basics.label: IT Director
basics.summary: Accomplished senior manager with over 15 years of experience leading complex projects and managing resources to optimize enterprise technology and support business objectives.

work.name: Company Name
work.position: Director of Information Technology and Analytics
work.summary: Directed the firm's word-wide Information Technology strategy. Established and instituted policies, procedures and technology to mitigate corporate security risk and position for Sarbanes-Oxley act compliance.
highlights: Chairman of the firm's cybersecurity committee

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Directed hardware and software configuration, installation, troubleshooting, and support activities. Oversaw administration of network infrastructure, business systems, cabling and circuits, and telecommunications platforms.
highlights: Led work order documentation and change request management
Administered CISCO multi-VLAN layer 3 switched LAN\WAN
Designed and administered CISCO VPN solution

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Administered and supported 250 client node Windows NT environment. Maintained DNS, WINS and DHCP in multi-site environment. Maintained 85 node development server environment.
highlights: Engineered and deployed System Management Server 2.0 infrastructure
Designed Workstation and Server imaging system using Symantec Ghost
Performed daily network monitoring tasks including backups (Veritas) and log checks

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Global provider of information technology products and services. Oversee and modify the daily download of data from several distributors.
highlights: Uploaded data to appropriate SQL databases
Maintained and performed hardware/software upgrades on Windows FTP servers
